title: Which forest garden book for me?

tasks.task: Understand forest gardening concepts and resources.
subtasks: Learn about the origins and development of forest gardening.
Identify key books and authors in the field of forest gardening.
Evaluate the differences between various forest gardening books.
Explore the technical aspects and designs of forest gardens.
Research the diverse plant species suitable for forest gardens.
Consider the practical aspects of establishing a forest garden.
Delve into the multifunctionality and benefits of forest gardening.
Assess the role of permaculture in forest gardening.
Examine case studies and real-world examples of successful forest gardens.
Understand the concept of the forest garden greenhouse.
Evaluate the accessibility and applicability of forest gardening resources.
Consider the environmental and personal health benefits of forest gardening.
